questions.question: The part produce possessing shearing defect has good surface finish:

explanations.b: Shearing defects result in poor surface finish.

questions.question: The buckling defect can be avoided by considering proper billet design:

explanations.a: Proper billet design helps prevent buckling.
explanations.b: Buckling is influenced by billet design.

questions.question: The defect caused due to improper die design is a non-geometrical defect:

explanations.a: Improper die design causes geometrical defects.
explanations.b: Die design defects are geometrical defects.

questions.question: The defect in which the flash is observed is the overfilled defect:

explanations.a: Overfill causes excess metal flow as flash.
explanations.b: Flash is not observed in underfill.

questions.question: It is recommended to preheat the billet at suitable plastic temperature for avoiding the under filled defect produce due to improper billet size:

explanations.a: Proper preheating improves metal flow and reduces underfill.
